trans-unit.target: PackageManagement (即

trans-unit.source: OneGet) Improvements
trans-unit.target: OneGet) 改善

trans-unit.source: Note: provide a proposed descriptive title and a brief description
trans-unit.target: 注意︰請提供建議的描述性標題和簡短描述

trans-unit.source: PackageManagement (aka.
trans-unit.target: PackageManagement (即

trans-unit.source: OneGet) Improvements
trans-unit.target: OneGet) 改善

trans-unit.source: The following are the fixes made in the WMF 5.1 to address some of the user experience gaps in the WMF 5.0 release.
trans-unit.target: 以下是 WMF 5.1 的修正，以解決 WMF 5.0 版本中的一些使用者體驗落差。

trans-unit.source: 1 **Version Alias**
trans-unit.target: 1 **版本別名**

trans-unit.source: **Scenario**: Assuming you have version 1.0 and 2.0 of a package, P1, installed on your system, and now you want to uninstall version 1.0, so you run "uninstall-package -name P1 -version 1.0".
trans-unit.target: **案例**︰假設系統上已安裝 1.0 及 2.0 版的封裝 P1，而您想要將 1.0 版解除安裝，所以執行 "uninstall-package -name P1 -version 1.0"。

trans-unit.source: You expect version 1.0 to be uninstalled after running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您希望執行 Cmdlet 後會將 1.0 版解除安裝。

trans-unit.source: However the result is that version 2.0 gets uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 不過，結果卻是將 2.0 版解除安裝。

trans-unit.source: The cause of the issue is that the "-version" parameter is an alias of the "-minimumversion" parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此問題的成因是 "-version" 參數是 "-minimumversion" 參數的別名。

trans-unit.source: When OneGet is looking for a qualitied package with the minimum version of 1.0, it returns the latest version.
trans-unit.target: 當 OneGet 在尋找至少 1.0 版的完整封裝時，會傳回最新的版本。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is expected under normal cases because finding the latest version is what most people want.
trans-unit.target: 正常情況下會發生此行為，因為大多數的人都想尋找最新版本。

trans-unit.source: However, it should not apply to the uninstall-package case.
trans-unit.target: 只不過，不應該套用到將封裝解除安裝的情況上。

trans-unit.source: **Solution**:removed -version alias entirely in OneGet and PowerShellGet.
trans-unit.target: **解決方案**︰完全移除 OneGet 和 PowerShellGet 中的 -version 別名。

trans-unit.source: 2 **Multiple Prompts for Bootstrapping NuGet Provider**
trans-unit.target: 2 **多次提示啟動載入 NuGet 提供者**

trans-unit.source: **Scenario**: When you run Find-Module or install-module or other OneGet cmdlets on your machine for the first time, OneGet is trying to bootstrap the NuGet provider.
trans-unit.target: **案例**：當您第一次在電腦上執行 Find-Module 或 Install-module 或其他 OneGet Cmdlet 時，OneGet 嘗試啟動載入 NuGet 提供者。

trans-unit.source: That's because the PowershellGet provider also uses the NuGet provider to download PowerShell modules.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為 PowerShellGet 提供者也使用 NuGet 提供者下載 PowerShell 模組。

trans-unit.source: OneGet then prompts the user for permission to install the NuGet provider.
trans-unit.target: 接著，OneGet 會提示使用者提供安裝 NuGet 提供者的權限。

trans-unit.source: After the user selects "yes" for the bootstrapping, the latest version of the NuGet provider will be installed.
trans-unit.target: 在使用者選取 [是] 啟動載入之後，就會安裝最新版的 NuGet 提供者。

trans-unit.source: However there is a case when you have an old version of NuGet provider installed on your machine, the older version of NuGet sometimes gets loaded first into the PowerShell session(that's the race condition in OneGet).
trans-unit.target: 不過，當電腦上安裝了較舊版本的 NuGet 提供者時，有時 PowerShell 工作階段會先載入舊版的 NuGet (亦即 OneGet 中的競爭條件)。

trans-unit.source: However PowerShellGet requires the later version of Nuget provider to work, so PowerShellGet asks the OneGet for bootstrapping the NuGet provider again.
trans-unit.target: 不過，PowerShellGet 需要較新版本的 NuGet 提供者工作，因此 PowerShellGet 會要求 OneGet 再次啟動載入 NuGet 提供者。

trans-unit.source: That's why you see the mulitple prompts for bootstrapping the NuGet provider.
trans-unit.target: 這就是您會看到多次提示啟動載入 NuGet 提供者的原因。

trans-unit.source: **Solution**: OneGet now loads the latest version of the NuGet provider to avoid multiple prompts for bootstrapping the NuGet provider.
trans-unit.target: **解決方案**︰OneGet 會載入最新版的 NuGet 提供者，避免多次提示啟動載入 NuGet 提供者。

trans-unit.source: A workaround also exists, i.e. manually delete the old version of the NuGet provider (NuGet-Anycpu.exe) if exists from $env:ProgramFiles\PackageManagement\ProviderAssemblies $env:LOCALAPPDATA\PackageManagement\ProviderAssemblies
trans-unit.target: 如果 $env: ProgramFiles\PackageManagement\ProviderAssemblies $env: LOCALAPPDATA\PackageManagement\ProviderAssemblies 有舊版的 NuGet 提供者，因應措施是手動刪除舊版 (NuGet Anycpu.exe)。

trans-unit.source: 3 **Machine with Intranet only**
trans-unit.target: 3 **僅限具有內部網路的電腦**

trans-unit.source: **Scenario**: For the enterprise scenario, people are working under an environment where there is no internet access but Intranet only.
trans-unit.target: **案例**︰企業案例中，員工的工作環境只能存取內部網路，不能存取網際網路。

trans-unit.source: OneGet did not support this case in WMF 5.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 WMF 5.0 中，OneGet 不支援此種案例。

trans-unit.source: **Solution**:
trans-unit.target: **解決方案**：

trans-unit.source: You can download the NuGet provider on another machine with Internet connection by using the command "Install-PackageProvider -Name NuGet".
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 "Install-PackageProvider -Name NuGet"命令，將 NuGet 提供者下載到有網際網路連線的其他電腦。

trans-unit.source: Find the NuGet provider you just installed under either $env:ProgramFiles\PackageManagement\ProviderAssemblies\nuget or $env:LOCALAPPDATA\PackageManagement\ProviderAssemblies\nuget.
trans-unit.target: 在 $env:ProgramFiles\PackageManagement\ProviderAssemblies\nuget 或 $env:LOCALAPPDATA\PackageManagement\ProviderAssemblies\nuget 下尋找剛剛安裝的 NuGet 提供者。

trans-unit.source: Copy the binaries over to a folder or network share location that your machine (the one without Internet) have access too and install NuGet provider with "Install-PackageProvider NuGet -Source <Path to folder>".
trans-unit.target: 將二進位檔複製到 (沒有網際網路的) 電腦也可以存取的資料夾或網路共用位置，然後以 "Install-PackageProvider NuGet -Source <Path to folder>" 安裝 NuGet 提供者。

trans-unit.source: 4 **Event log**
trans-unit.target: 4 **事件記錄檔**

trans-unit.source: When you install packages, you are changing the state of your machine.
trans-unit.target: 安裝封裝即是變更電腦的狀態。

trans-unit.source: For diagnosis purpose, OneGet now logs events to the Windows event log for install, uninstall, and save-package.
trans-unit.target: 在 WMF 5.1 中，OneGet 會將安裝、解除安裝和儲存封裝等事件記錄在 Windows 事件記錄檔，供診斷之用。

trans-unit.source: The Event channel is the same as PowerShell, that is, Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell, Operational.
trans-unit.target: 事件通道和 PowerShell 一樣，亦即 Microsoft-Windows-PowerShell、Operational。

trans-unit.source: 5 **Authentication Support** OneGet now supports finding and installing packages from a repository that requires basic authentication.
trans-unit.target: 5 **驗證支援** OneGet 支援從需要基本驗證的儲存機制尋找和安裝封裝。

trans-unit.source: You can supply your credential to the Find-Package and Install-Package cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以向 Find-Package 和 Install-Package Cmdlet 提供您的認證。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: 6 **Using OneGet Behind a Proxy**
trans-unit.target: 6 **使用 Proxy 後方的 OneGet**

trans-unit.source: OneGet now takes proxy parameters: -ProxyCredential and -Proxy.
trans-unit.target: OneGet 現在採用 Proxy 參數：-ProxyCredential 和 -Proxy。

trans-unit.source: Using these parameters, you can specify proxy url and proxy credential to OneGet cmdlets (by default, we use the system proxy settings).
trans-unit.target: 使用這些參數，您可以在 OneGet Cmdlet 指定 Proxy URL 和 Proxy 認證 (預設使用系統 Proxy 設定)。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：
